thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 16 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Biom'up FY Net Loss Of Consolidated Operations Widens To 31.3 Million Euros

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Biom'up FY Net Loss Of Consolidated Operations Widens To 31.3 Million Euros
text:
April 16 (Reuters) - BIOM UP SA:
* BIOMâ€™UP REPORTS 2017 FULL-YEAR RESULTS AND PROVIDES CORPORATE UPDATE
* AS AT DECEMBER 31, 2017, CASH AND CASH EQUIVALENTS AMOUNTED TO EUR 32.9
* 2018 FOCUS ON PRODUCT LAUNCHES, SCALE-UP OF MANUFACTURING AND HEMOSTATIC PRODUCT PORTFOLIO EXPANSION
* FY NET LOSS OF CONS. OPERATIONS EUR 31.3 MILLION VERSUS EUR 14.0 MILLION YEAR AGO
* FY REVENUES EUR 1.8 MILLION VERSUS EUR 3.1 MILLION YEAR AGO
* FY OPERATING LOSS EUR 17.7 MILLION VERSUS EUR 13.9 MILLION YEAR AGO
* RAISES C. EUR 100 MILLION THROUGH 2017 TO DATE THANKS TO IPO ON EURONEXT AND ADDITIONAL RAISES
* SAYS COMMERCIAL ROLL-OUT OF HEMOBLAST BELLOWS IN EUROPE AND THE U.S. TO START IN MID-2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
